sn51.13:1.1: “Chandance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissaya labhati samadhim, labhati cittassa ekaggatam—
sn51.13:1.3: So anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn51.13:1.4: Uppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn51.13:1.5: Anuppannanam kusalanam dhammanam uppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn51.13:1.6: Uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn51.13:1.8: Iti ayanca chando, ayanca chandasamadhi, ime ca padhanasankhara—
sn51.13:2.1: Viriyance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissaya labhati samadhim, labhati cittassa ekaggatam—
sn51.13:2.4: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn51.13:2.6: Iti idanca viriyam, ayanca viriyasamadhi, ime ca padhanasankhara—
sn51.13:3.1: Cittance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissaya labhati samadhim, labhati cittassa ekaggatam—
sn51.13:3.4: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn51.13:3.6: Iti idanca cittam, ayanca cittasamadhi, ime ca padhanasankhara—
sn51.13:4.1: Vimamsance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissaya labhati samadhim, labhati cittassa ekaggatam—
sn51.13:4.3: So anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati …pe…
sn51.13:4.4: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn51.13:4.6: Iti ayanca vimamsa, ayanca vimamsasamadhi, ime ca padhanasankhara—
